ygData.subject: Re: Giant fire beetle?
ygData.msgSnippet: The Queen outside Qeynos has magical Giant Fire Beetle Eyes, and they have charges of Enchant Silver (like 3 I think) on them. I haven t fought her in awhile,
ygData.messageBody:
The Queen outside Qeynos has magical Giant Fire Beetle Eyes, and they have
charges of Enchant Silver (like 3 I think) on them. I haven't fought her in
awhile, but I tried around level 10 with my warrior and it was a CHALLENGE
to be sure. She's a caster, by the way... And, the guards are always a hop,
a skip, and a jump away...

-Zantaer, Level 19 Barbarian Warrior, Fennin Ro, SOK

-----Original Message-----
From: ken satchell "flash-net & nikken distrubter"
[mailto:ken4p@...]
Sent: Monday, June 14, 1999 7:52 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Giant fire beetle?


From: "ken satchell \"flash-net & nikken distrubter\"" <ken4p@...>

Legs are not what is desired not sure if they have any worth either.
I am looking for the giant fire beetle eyes which I have beeen told comes
off of a queen klicknik which in beta my level 8 monk was able to take it no
problem, unless they are harder now. Not sure where the queen klicknik in
rivervale is.
Ken aka darklaw from beta


> From: Doug Sorensen <belgarth_of_surefall@...>
>
> I didn't see a mention of any legs. I had no idea
> that's what was desired.
>
> Belgarth Wolfstrider
>
> --- Marc Stone <mes5415@...> wrote:
> > From: "Marc Stone" <mes5415@...>
> >
> > Well many have posted on this but sadly a few
> > comments are wrong. Unless
> > they changed this quest, a giant fire beetle leg
> > comes from the Queen
> > Klackniks. These can be found near Qeynos or
> > Rivervale newbie areas. It is a
> > rare spawn. It is quite tough for newbies though, i
> > suggest at least level
> > 10-12 before doing it if not higher. been a long
> > time since I killed one.
> >
> > The beetles in karana are called Giant Beetles and
> > DO NOT drop the items you
> > are looking for.
> >
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: Doug Sorensen <belgarth_of_surefall@...>
> > To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
> > Sent: Monday, June 14, 1999 12:08 PM

> >

> > they
> > >were about level 10 or so, but it has been a long
> > >while since I fought within that level.
> > >
> > >Belgarth Wolfstrider
> > >
> > >--- "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
> > wrote:

> > >>
> > >> I don't think Giant Fire Beetles exist. Someone
> > in
> > >> my guild asked that and
> > >> I've never seen em. I've seen Fire Beetles, and
> > >> Giant Beetles, but not Giant
> > >> Fire Beetles. If they do exist, it's on one of
> > the
> > >> outlying islands, not on
> > >> the main continent (I've been everywhere but
> > >> Cazith-Thule and the
> > >> "evil-race" towns).
> > >>
